DOC.HEADLINE: COWS REMAIN POPULAR ON AND OFF THE FARM
DOC.TEXT: These days , it seems cows are as popular in urban homes as they are_on farms and ranches . Decorating with cow themes remains as trendy as ever . Here ' s a do-it-yourself project that will add a little of that bovine charm to your home or yard . This cow planter can be used indoors or out : just fill it up with potted plants or flowers and put it on the porch , in the yard or in the kitchen or den . The completed cow planter measures 37 inches long by 14 inches wide by 21 inches high . The Cow Planter plan , No . 825 , is $ 6.50 and includes step-by-step directions with 15 photos , full-size traceable patterns , exploded diagrams and a shopping list and cutting schedule .
